skills: Direction, Documentation, Innovation, Interior design, Team lead, Leadership, Materials, Meetings, MS Office Suite, Office, Organizational, Personnel, Presentations, Problem Resolution, Processes, Procurement, Programming, Project Coordination, Real Estate, Retail, Sales, Space Planning, Workplace Strategy, FF&E Expertise, ADA & Building Codes, Written & Verbal Communication, Product Specification, AutoCAD, Salesforce, ADA, Specification, AutoCAD, Strategy, Budgets, Verbal Communication, Change management, Written, COUNCIL, Creativity, Customer satisfaction
summary: Independent and results driven Design Professional with an extensive background in the design process. Proficient in taking initiative, along with a desire to achieve client satisfaction, for a record of accomplished results.
work_experience: The professional has experience as an Independent Designer since April 2020, where they create site and fixture plans utilizing AutoCAD and perform on-site surveys for space improvement solutions. From January 2015 to March 2020, as a Specifications Manager, they traveled extensively to conduct product presentations, grew existing accounts by 40%, and identified high-value projects to drive specifications and exceed sales goals. As a Workplace Consultant from January 2003 to January 2015, they led teams in creating well-connected workplaces, reduced office real estate, introduced organizational agility, developed corporate standards, supervised furniture installations for projects over $1,000,000, and coordinated large projects up to 1,000,000 sq ft, ensuring successful personnel relocations and customer satisfaction. Earlier, as a Senior Interior Designer from January 1994 to January 2003, they utilized interior design processes across all phases and created professional presentations.
